abstract: Fitch Ratings recently estimated that Citigroup is on the hook for more than $37 billion in loans to fund leveraged buyouts — a kind of debt that many buyers have been treating as radioactive, or at least very overpriced, in the last several weeks. That was more than any other single bank or brokerage on Fitch’s list.
